Reviews.Title: “Nice comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Stephan R
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel reunion hotel conveniently placed close saint denis metro service excellent staff encountered courteous helpful twin comfortable – spacey amenities available free wifi bathroom consisted shower separate toilet wash basin excellent condition operating clean breakfast cellar – watch head nice experience quick breakfast cost 7 buffet nice – charged 12 euros hot food merci beaucoup – nice stay stay visiting paris coming

Reviews.Title: “Does the important things well; great little hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Chumbeiro
Reviews.Content: placed exploring central paris 5 minutes walk metro 15 minutes gare du est 25 gare du nord 25 river seine relatively hotel 20 5 floors clean recently decorated tiny pedestrianised street slightly larger perfectly adequate couple night stay bed include ipod dock coffee machine manage squeeze bath wardrobe hotel staff courteous helpful throughout 2 night stay location edge redlight district feel unsafe threatened quirky paris reasonable bars cafes restaurants 5 4 hotel doesnt pretend value money expensive city wed stay

Reviews.Title: “Quite nice and peaceful stay”
Reviews.Author: tribru69
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed hotel 20 2012 till 23rd arriving paris wrong bad impression paris parisians heard people getting hotel reception nice experiance begin nice gentleman receptionist explained check quick neibourhood fine bothered night people friendly hostile hotel loacted peaceful street modern clean price bathroom sparkling clean everyday indian lady receptionist especially charming friendly helpful house keeping staff thanks team stay comfortable consider returning hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sam R
Reviews.Content: hotel budget paris didnt dire reviews price hotel amazing similar quality deal expensive stayed standard double fairly expected tiny beautifully decorated clean bathroom larger expecting gorgeous clean huge deep bath shower toiletries included shower gel soap shampoo bath salts nice addition cotton pads removal nail file conditioner included id brought own anyway breakfast day 12 euro little expensive fairly selection pastries yoghurt bread cold meats cheeses etc eggs location close metro station 5 minutes walk handy getting located fairly rundown city street hotel nice quiet overall enjoyed stay returning paris definitely consider staying value

Reviews.Title: “reccomended hotel”
Reviews.Author: cincili
Reviews.Content: hotel saint martin chose rating tripadvisor wrong hotel excellent position close metro station quiet street closed traffic staff friendly clean closet pleasant experience

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a Best Western traveler
Reviews.Content: satisfied hotel hotel website recently renovated nicely decorated regular visitor paris hotels didnt appointed hotel located busy evenings quieter located nearby restaurants metro return

Reviews.Title: “good”
Reviews.Author: chris c
Reviews.Content: quality expensive friendly staff nice noisy night bed wifi bt lobby nespresso machine arrived afternoon ready left luggage walk luggage day flight

Reviews.Title: “Holyday was good!”
Reviews.Author: IraRussia
Reviews.Content: hotel location 23 min metro station 3 lines 10 minutes centre paris staff hotel helpful provide information trip breakfast hotels fresh orange juice clean choice hotel

Reviews.Title: “For me the best!!!”
Reviews.Author: Michel99
Reviews.Content: hotel time spend weekend month hotel located safe african shops hairdressers close les halles le hotel recently renovatedthe modern clean comfortable beds free coffee nespresso machine tea water breakfast people stay hotel pleasure dear people faubourg thank hospitality

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ptkaos
Reviews.Content: hotel comfortable modern trendy staff reception friendly little bit concerned surrounding single metro station 5minute walking distance weve stayed 1 night experienced positive

Reviews.Title: “An oasis!”
Reviews.Author: Fennings
Reviews.Content: hotel charming oasis edge slightly run paris tourist orientated easy walking gare du nord gare de lest street easily missed recently refurbished public clean modern appealing staying overnight didnt matter lift rattle clean comfortable service surprise bed breakfast hotel discovered morning receptionist eat head south towards boulevard st martin bistros etc breakfast hotel buffet served vaults building throughout stay staff friendly spoke english

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: richard h
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend trip getting eurostar hotel 10 min walk station hotel clean appeared breakfast lovely filled day questionable poeple hanging street corners day leave morning evening hotel located main roads stick poeple cafes stay

Reviews.Title: “A true little Gem”
Reviews.Author: carolina h
Reviews.Content: value arrived hotel flight greeted helpful friendly staff found 4th floor quiet double glazed windows absolutely spotless comfortable bed equipped amenities required including wifi flat screen tv placed viewing coffee machine safe proper bathtub designed buffet breakfast generous choices eat drink location concerned colourful feels safe walking distance centre pompidou bus 38 stops major street corner takes quartier latin minutes short impressed booked stop paris couple months

Reviews.Title: “Close your eyes to the location......”
Reviews.Author: Car0bella
Reviews.Content: enjoyed hotel spotless staff breakfasts lovely whilst light window overlooking internal courtyard priced offer negative location fairly close gare de lest surrounded initially prostitutes simply people visiting hair dressing nail genuine stay probably

Reviews.Title: “Un petit trésor a Paris.”
Reviews.Author: alliec79
Reviews.Content: im glad found hotel deal price overlooking tiny street located location reviewers concerned safety completely safe walking evenings hotel located 5min walk nearest metro station lovely condition staff ware friendly helpful bedroom prudish shower located bed separated divider wall shower curtain complete privacy bathe layouts offer privacy plan paris happily stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Thank god i found this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: stickyfingers85
Reviews.Content: firstly spent weeks trying hotel paris quality fair price paris expensive hope finding eventually booking cheap ugly looking hotel city thankfully 2 weeks trip found western hotel trip advisor reading reviews looking pictures booked straight pros location close 2 metro stops easy access sights refurbished hotel entire looks lots nice little touches nespresso machine ipodiphone dock staff helped locate advised home seeing moulin rouge cosy bed little thats paris cons walk hotel little scared lots guys hanging street corners hotel assured safe touts looking business hair salons breakfast little expensive 12 euros look local nice breakfast cheaper overall recommend hotel staff looked bathroom trip perfect tip shop price hotel found cheap price bookingcom couple days checked actual western website willing pay advance refund option 30 euros price

Reviews.Title: “Great value for beautiful but expensive Paris!”
Reviews.Author: JKAMO
Reviews.Content: paris tough getting accommodation extortionate hotel via flash sale previously bad reviews refurb little hotel context tough getting decent accommodation city located afro hairdressers initially surprised wary amount hanging outside hotel found touts hairdressers loving location proximity sites walking distance lourve near trendy canel st martin spot people watching hotel inside fashionable hip nespresso machines ipod docks funky interiors look little worn price paris staff uber friendly vibrant
